summary:
Added trees to major cities to make them feel more organic.
Please read full description. :)
descriptionHtml:
Hey guys,

Now before we get started I would like you to note that this is my first \'mod\' and I have little experience with the Creation Kit.

Also HOLY FUDGE NUGGETS! >1000 DLs! I love you guys! :D

Now that\'s out of the way, on to the mod. ^^

I got the idea from this mod:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9424
[I have NOT included tress in Whiterun because you can just get them here]

Also due to request, here\'s the ENB I use. :)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4142

I wanted to try adding trees to all the major cities to make them feel more organic, less bland, etc....
I have attempted to keep the local flora the same, so you won\'t see snow tress in Solitude, etc.. :)
It\'s not the best mod ever but it\'s good for my first, or at least it is in my opinion. :P

Let me know what you think. Constructive criticism is welcome. :D

Markarth has no tress due to it being built into steep rocks. No space for trees, they would just look out of place.


I know that\'s not all the towns/cities, I\'ll finish them if I have time, y\'know what with exams and what-not. :|

Credits:
Rabbitlol for the idea. ^^

Thanks and enjoy,
DrHaggizBlonde


P.S. I\'m working on re-doing some animations in SKyrim, again I\'m new to it and anyone who can help would be appreciated. :)
Requirements: 3DS Max 2012, NifTools plugin. 

Contact

Email: drhaggizblonde@gmail.com
Skype: drhaggizblonde

[Changelog]

V1
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Added trees to:
-Solitude
-Windhelm
-Riften
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

V1_1
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Solitude - Added more vegetationa and detail here and there, quite subtle but it\'s there.

Windhelm - Added more tress and vegetation, approx. twice as many tress and v1.
         - Also fixed a clipping issue with one of the trees 

Riften - Slight vegetation increase.
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

V1_2
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
Windhelm - Hopefully fixed NPCs getting stuck near inn.
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
author: DrHaggiz

files.name: More Organic Cities V1
files.changelogHtml: Added tress to Solitude, Windhelm and Riften
